main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a circular, baseball-sized white to yellow object in the sky over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was initially stationary, then rose to 25,000 feet, remained stationary briefly, and then descended and disappeared.
The object was observed for 4-5 minutes.
The observer reported the object moved from northwest to southeast.
There was no physical evidence or photographs of the object.
The Air Force concluded the sighting was a 'probable' balloon.
sighted object: circular, baseball-sized white to yellow object
